author: By Emma Munbodh
title: British Airways sale extended to Tuesday: Abu Dhabi, LA from £350 return, and Barcelona from £99
text:
The British Airways summer sale starts today - and it includes discounts on thousands of flights and holidays including San Francisco , Abu Dhabi and Las Vegas.
The sale , which also includes savings in World Traveller and World Traveller Plus cabins from Heathrow and Gatwick for travel between August 16 2015, and June 16, 2016, has been extended by just under a week, to Tuesday 21 July.
As well as reduced fares to the US , including Los Angeles and Miami from £483 return, it includes Abu Dhabi from £350 return, and Spain from £99, including accommodation.
For even bigger savings, see their 'cheapest fares' page or last minute deals for late getaways from £111.
Customers can secure a holiday online from a £150 deposit per booking. You can view the entire British Airways sale here including their Europe sale from £129.
For more holiday bargains, see our cheap holidays page or our guide on how to book an all inclusive holiday .
British Airways package holiday deals New York: British Airways offers 3 nights at the 3* Wellington hotel, from £449 per person , travelling January 11 - 31 2016. Includes World Traveller return flights from London Heathrow and accommodation. Book by July 14 2015.
Barcelona: British Airways offers two nights at the 4* Ateea Valles hotel in Barcelona, from £105 per person , travelling November 22 - December 24 2015. Includes Euro Traveller return flights from London Heathrow and accommodation with breakfast. Book by July 14 2015.
Malaga: British Airways offers seven nights at the 3* Adriano hotel, from £108 per person , travelling October 1 - October 9 2016. Includes Euro Traveller return flights from London Heathrow and accommodation. Book by July 14 2015.
Orlando: British Airways offers 7 nights at the 3* Ramada Hotel Gateway, from £449 per person , travelling January 4 - February 24 2016. Includes World Traveller return flights from London Gatwick and accommodation. Book by July 14 2015.
Customers can book online at www.ba.com . British Airways flights include free online check-in and in-flight refreshments.
